response.overview: The regional public organization "Children's Association" UNPRESS "thanks the All-Russian Children's Center" Eaglet "and personally Alexander Dzheus for help in organizing the filming, the Children's Camp" Star "and personally Tatiana Tyutina, the All-Russian Open Forum of Children's and Youth Screen Creativity" Boomerang "and personally Natalia Vasilyev, the All-Russian State Institute of Cinematography named after S. A. Gerasimov (VGIK) and personally Igor Klebanov, PJSC AVTOVAZ and personally the Deputy Director of the Marketing Directorate Oleg Klimenko.  The film was shot as part of the project "Children and Youth Against Violence and Cruelty by Means of Cinema", which is being implemented with the use of a grant from the President of the Russian Federation for the development of civil society provided by the Presidential Grants Foundation.
response.title: Lord of the Flies
